title: Viking Werewolves from Mars
description: In this Trestle Press digital short story, Sam Lang offers a one-shot of dark humor and science fiction.Ron Ungary returns for this Halloween treat. This time, Ron and his best friend Teddy are on a cross-country road trip. Their travels take them into the heart of a thousand year old curse. Ron has to ask are werewolves real? And are they from Mars? Tight-fitting Halloween costumes and an assortment of Ronâ€™s inventions will guarantee an explosive conclusion to the events at an isolated truck stop under a full moon.
author: Sam Lang
